com.compomics.util.experiment

Class ShotgunProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.compomics.util.experiment.ShotgunProtocol
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ShotgunProtocol
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Generic class gathering information on a shotgun proteomics protocol.
    Author:
    Marc Vaudel
    See Also:

      • addLabel

        public void addLabel(String ptmName,
                     boolean complete)
        Adds a label.
        Parameters:
        ptmName - the name of the modification used for the label
        complete - boolean indicating whether the labeling is complete (true) or partial (false)

      • getLabellingPtms

        Returns:
        the inferred protocol
